newsitem.title: USA: ILOG acquires optimization software firm.
newsitem.headline: ILOG acquires optimization software firm.

text.p: ILOG SA said Monday that it has a definitive agreement to acquire CPLEX Optimization Inc, a privately-held company that provides optimization software.

ILOG, which provides advanced software components, said it would acquire the Nevada-based company for 1.7 million ILOG shares, $15 million and a $5 million note that is subject to upward adjustment of up to an additional $2.4 million.
ILOG said it also will grant options for 1.1 million shares to CPLEX management and employees.
The company said it will present the deal to its shareholders for a vote on August 20.
